I am the operations manager for CoastWatch Great Lakes Node. I have been working on satellite data for over two decades. My work is mainly focused on how to transform satellite data into daily usage. I developed Great Lakes satellite data training and tutorial materials to help users better understand and utilize these products.  

## Areas of Expertise and Interest
*Satellite data acquisition and processing.

*Satellite data product development.

*Data server management.

*Satellite data training.
